spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall layout is recognizable (central living/dining core with bedrooms on left and right), but several plan-to-render mismatches are present: (E2) multiple interior partitions on the right side (corridor/bedroom separators and the long horizontal wall in the mid-right) do not align with the 2D plan; (E2/E3) several door openings are shifted and/or not placed where the plan indicates (notably around the right-side hall and the central-top wet-room zone); (E2) window positions/counts along exterior walls do not consistently match the plan (top wall and bottom wall windows are simplified/shifted); (E4) room proportions differ—central living area appears enlarged while adjacent rooms (especially right-side rooms and wet spaces) compress/shift compared to the 2D dimensions.

structural_fidelity.notes: Mixed fidelity: (E2) adjacency relationships are mostly preserved (kitchen-left, bedrooms-left/right), but the right-side circulation walling and door connections differ from the plan, changing intended access patterns; (E1) some planned door locations are not represented as true doors (appear as open passages or are missing entirely); (E2) wet-room partitioning at the top is rearranged relative to the plan; (E5) the rightmost small appended space reads as a fully enclosed lounge-like room in the render, whereas the plan suggests a small external annex/balcony-type space with different intent; (E4) inconsistent wall thickness/offsets vs the plan’s consistent wall bands.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture is broadly plausible but not tightly mapped: (E2) living room seating arrangement and dining placement differ from the 2D symbols (render adds/relocates seating relative to plan); (E4) some furniture scale feels off (oversized sofas/tables relative to room widths, especially central living); (E5) furnishing of the rightmost annex as an interior sitting room conflicts with the likely balcony/aux space intent in the plan.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Good visual quality and readability with clean materials and coherent lighting. Deductions: (E6) camera is closer to a top-down perspective than a true isometric/orthographic hybrid; (E6) minor depth/perspective cues and shadowing reduce orthographic accuracy; geometry is mostly clean but some openings/frames look simplified versus plan detail.

detected_errors.description: Right-side corridor and bedroom partition walls do not align with the 2D plan; several wall segments are shifted/reshaped, altering circulation.
Top wet-room zone partitioning differs: bathroom/WC boundaries and fixture bay placement are rearranged compared to the plan.
Some planned interior doors are missing as explicit doors (represented as open gaps or not present), especially around the right-side hall connections.
Door orientation/swing intent from the plan is not respected (openings do not correspond to the planned hinged-door placements).
Exterior window placement/count does not match the plan consistently (top and bottom elevations show simplified/shifted window positions).
Room proportions are distorted: central living/dining appears oversized while adjacent rooms (right-side rooms and wet spaces) appear compressed relative to the 2D plan.
Rightmost appended space is rendered as an enclosed furnished sitting room, which conflicts with the plan’s small annex/balcony-like space intent.
Rendering is not strictly isometric/orthographic; slight perspective and lighting/shadow stylization reduce projection accuracy.
